bibl.title: Hosaye Sakaguchi v. Henry M. White. Praeciepe for Record on Appeal
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington

body.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES IN AND FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON, NORTHERN DIVISION.
In the Matter of the Petition of } No. 5959 Hosaye Sakaguchi, } PRAECIPE FOR RECORD ON APPEAL for a Writ of Habeas Corpus.

THE CLERK OF THE ABOVE ENTITLED COURT:- You will please make transcript of record on appeal embodying the following papers: Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus Order to Show Cause Return to Order to Show Cause Memorandum Decision of the Court Judgement Dismissing Proceedings Notice of Appeal Petition for Appeal Citation Bond on Appeal Assignment of Error Orer and Stipulation to Transmit Original Exhibit Order Extending Time to File Record A print of said portion of the record is herewith tendered you for comparison and certification.
You are also requested to transmit the original citation and original record of proceedings in office of Commissioner of Immigration as an original exhibit.
FILED IN THE UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
JUN 24 1921 F.M. HARSHBERGER, CLERK BY. S.E. Leitch, DEPUTY.
